DOC.detailed_description: The following instrumental evaluation perform basal condition ( T0 - product use ) , 4 ( T4 ) 8 week-treatment ( T8 ) : - Image analysis UV flash ( Wood 's light ) - Photographic recovery - Skin spot image analysis - Skin colour evaluation - Spectrophotometry ( skin brightness ) - Optical colorimetry ( spot colour ) At end study ( T8 ) , volunteer fill questionnaire regarding : - efficacy study product ( skin brightness hydration , spots dimension colour intensity - score : mark ; mark ; medium ; light ; absent ) - cosmetic acceptability study product : colour perfume application , consistency , spreadability , absorption , effect skin , greasiness presence product residue ( score : negative ; medium ; good ; excellent ) product tolerance ( score : bad ; poor ; medium ; good ; excellent ) . At end study investigator assess treatment tolerance consider possible appearance related adverse event bad , poor , medium , good , excellent .
